title: The woman in the video is not the Hyderabad Veterinary Doctor who was murdered
subtitle: The video is not the last speech of Hyderabad Veterinary Doctor who was raped and murdered. She is Allola Divya Reddy, the founder of Klimom Wellness & Farms.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that the video shows the last speech of the Hyderabad Veterinary Doctor who was raped and murdered. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post. 



Claim: The last speech of the Hyderabad Veterinary Doctor who was raped and murdered. Fact: The woman in the video is not the Hyderabad Veterinary Doctor who was raped and murdered. She is Allola Divya Reddy, the founder of Klimom Wellness & Farms. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

Even though it is not legal to mention the name of the rape victim, many news agencies have run news stories with the name of the Hyderabad Veterinary Doctor who was raped and murdered. The name should not be mentioned as per the directions of the Supreme Court, but her name is definitely not ‘Divya Reddy’.

In the video, at 0:37 secs, it can be seen that her name is ‘Divya Allola Reddy’ and she is the founder of ‘Klimom’.

When searched for ‘Klimom’ on Google, it was found that it sells dairy-based products and focuses on indigenous cow breeds (Gir cows). On the website of ‘Klimom’, it can be found that the speech in the video was given by Divya Allola Reddy (Founder of ‘Klimom’) when she was awarded the ‘National Gopal Ratna Award 2018’. The extended version of the posted video was also uploaded by ‘Klimom’ on its YouTube channel. ‘Klimom’ has also posted about this event on its Twitter and Facebook accounts. 



In a video uploaded by ‘ABN Telugu’, it was found that she is the daughter-in-law of the Telangana Minister Allola Indrakaran Reddy.

To sum it up, the woman in the video is not the Hyderabad Veterinary Doctor who was raped and murdered.
